questions.question: According to the Book of Exodus, where did Moses receive the Ten Commandments?
What is the first Commandment practised by members of the Catholic Church?

choices.answer: Honour thy father and thy mother.
Thou shalt have no strange gods before Me

questions.question: The ninth Commandment states, "Thou shalt not covet thy neighbour's wife". What does this mean?

choices.answer: Don't give your neighbour's wife presents.
Don't desire your neighbour's wife for yourself.
Don't try to marry your neighbour's wife.

questions.question: The Ten Commandments are known by what other name?
In the numbering used by the Catholic Church, what is the seventh Commandment of God?

choices.answer: Thou shalt not covet your neighbour's possessions.
Remember to keep holy the Sabbath day.

questions.question: The Ten Commandments are recorded in two books of the Bible. Do you know which two?
What is the third Commandment practised by the Catholic Church?

choices.answer: Thou shalt not covet thy neighbour's goods.
Remember to keep holy the Sabbath day.

questions.question: When Moses received the Commandments from God, what were they written on?
what is commanded by the second Commandment of God?

choices.answer: Honor your father and your mother.
You shall not covet your neighbor's wife.
Thou shalt not take the name of the Lord thy God in vain.

questions.question: The Catholic Church states that the fourth Commandment is which of the following?

choices.answer: Thou shalt not take the name of the Lord your God in vain.
Thou shalt not bear false witness.
You shall not covet your neighbour's wife.

questions.question: The commandment that states "Thou shalt not kill" is _____.

choices.answer: bad translation, the word should be murder and not kill
a bad translation, the word should be smite and not kill

questions.question: When we have troubles in life, we should turn to _____ for help.
Your neighbour's have everything in life that you ever wanted. What do you do?

choices.answer: steal it from them when they are asleep
be angry because you don't have everything you want
be happy with what you do have

questions.question: A graven image is _____?

choices.answer: something God told us not to make
a carving in wood or stone that some people worship

questions.question: You found twenty dollars on the floor at work. What do you do with it?

choices.answer: keep it and thank God for the blessing
try and find out who's it is and give it back to them

questions.question: Cheating on your spouse is _____?

choices.answer: hurting the ones that love you
setting a bad example for your family

questions.question: Who received the 10 Commandments from God originally?
When did God give Moses the 10 Commandments?

choices.answer: After the flood receded and they got off the Ark
When the Israelites were wandering in the desert
When the Israelites entered the Promised Land

questions.question: The 10 Commandments can be broken into two sections:

choices.answer: The positive commandments & the negative commandments
The commandments about loving God &  loving others
The commandments that make sense &  do not make sense
The commandments with real-world applications &  outdated

questions.question: Which of the following are not commandment regarding to God.

choices.answer: You shall have no other Gods before me
You shall not take the name of God in vain
You shall keep holy the Sabbath day
You shall love your neighbor as yourself
